mapper.select: SELECT q.question_idx, q.cl_idx, q.question_text, q.question_create_at, a.answer_idx, a.answer_text, a.ai_feedback, a.answer_create_at FROM question q LEFT JOIN answer a ON q.question_idx = a.question_idx AND a.member_idx = #{memberIdx} WHERE q.cl_idx = #{clIdx} ORDER BY q.question_idx LIMIT #{startRow}, #{listLimit}
